reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater festive and sparkly, with one mentioning it sparkles like a disco ball. However, the sizing receives mixed feedback, with some customers saying it fits true to size while others find it way too small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars fits true to size cute
items.body: cute. bought for an ugly sweater contest. to cute to win Read more
items.author: Jill D. Aldridge

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and fun holiday sweater
items.body: I love how cute this gingerbread man is. The sweater is made of a heavy quality yarn and will keep you warm while looking festive. I ordered a XXL and it fit perfectly. I would have love to keep this sweater but unfortunately for me, I live in the southeast and the sweater was just too heavy for my menopausely body. Read more
items.author: SouthernShandyGirl

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but a little short in length.
items.body: PRO: This is a cute sweater. The material is thick enough to keep you warm like a typical sweater should. CON: you lift your arms, your belly will show. I got a medium and I am 5’4 and weight 135. I would not recommend sizing up because a large would be too baggie. Plan to add a longer tank top underneath this. Read more
items.author: Hiatt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get it!! It’s Perfect
items.body: As pictured, it’s warm and pretty and feels nicely made. Fit is true to size — I ordered up for an oversized fit and it worked very well. Many compliments. Read more
items.author: Good reviews

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The not so ugly, ugly Christmas sweater
items.body: Women Sequins Patterns Ugly Christmas Sweater that is not so ugly. Beautifully made with excellent teamwork. I do not like sweaters that are too tight. I sized up one size so I could wear an undershirt if the sweater was scratchy and it is perfect for over a thin undershirt. Order your true size or up one size if you like just a smidge more room. I found that I do not need the undershirt. The sweater is soft and very comfortable. Beautiful design and fit. Read more
items.author: Anne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable sweater
items.body: This holiday sweater is adorable. It’s soft and the detailing is perfection. It’s a sweater you will want to wear all season long. It’s fun and elegant and sparkly. Unfortunately the wrong size came so I can’t tell if it fits true to size. I am a XXL and a M arrived so it’s hard for me to even guess if the sizing is accurate. I would recommend you take a chance on it though … that’s how pretty the sweater is. Read more
items.author: Need divorce attorney

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Size
items.body: Way too small. Not sized correctly. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits accurately
items.body: I love this sweater! It’s the perfect blend of being pretty and just a little obnoxious lol! Though it’s a bit shorter than I expected I would say it runs true to size and fits as I expected it to. I ordered a Medium and am 5’8”/140 pounds for reference. The material is extremely soft and comfy to wear all day Read more
items.author: Rachel

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Reindeer/B, Reindeer/R, Gingerbread Man/B, Gingerbread Man/R. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
